Package ohos.dcall

Class CallStateObserver

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.dcall.CallStateObserver

  • public class CallStateObserver
extends Object
    An observer class used to monitor call service state updates.

    The call service states include the call state, voice mailbox state, and unconditional call forwarding (CFU) setting state. To monitor a specific type of updates, you must inherit this class and override the methods corresponding to OBSERVE_flags in mask transferred by DistributedCallManager#addObserver. These methods will be invoked when the corresponding service state updates and the observer is added to monitor the updates.

    Since:
    3

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static int CALL_STATE_IDLE
      Indicates that there is no ongoing call.
      static int CALL_STATE_OFFHOOK
      Indicates that a least one call is in the dialing, active, or hold state, and there is no new incoming call ringing or waiting.
      static int CALL_STATE_RINGING
      Indicates that an incoming call is ringing or waiting.
      static int CALL_STATE_UNKNOWN
      Indicates an invalid state, which is used when the call state fails to be obtained.
      static int OBSERVE_MASK_CALL_FORWARDING_UNCONDITIONAL_INDICATOR
      Indicates a mask that monitors CFU setting updates.
      static int OBSERVE_MASK_CALL_STATE
      Indicates a mask that monitors call state updates.
      static int OBSERVE_MASK_VOICE_MAIL_MESSAGE_INDICATOR
      Indicates a mask that monitors voice mailbox state updates.

      Creates an observer instance for receiving call service state updates in a specified slot.
      CallStateObserver​(int slot, EventRunner runner)
      Creates an observer instance for receiving call service state updates in a specified slot.

        public static final int OBSERVE_MASK_CALL_FORWARDING_UNCONDITIONAL_INDICATOR
        Indicates a mask that monitors CFU setting updates.

        Applications must have the ohos.permission.GET_TELEPHONY_STATE permission to register this event.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CallStateObserver

        public CallStateObserver​()
                  throws IllegalArgumentException
        Creates an observer instance for receiving call service state updates in any slot.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - Throws this exception if there is no EventRunner that can process the callback.

      • CallStateObserver

        public CallStateObserver​(int slot)
                  throws IllegalArgumentException
        Creates an observer instance for receiving call service state updates in a specified slot.
        Parameters:
        slot - Indicates the ID of the slot. The value 0 indicates slot 1, and the value 1 indicates slot 2.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - Throws this exception if there is no EventRunner that can process the callback.

      • CallStateObserver

        public CallStateObserver​(int slot,
                         EventRunner runner)
                  throws IllegalArgumentException
        Creates an observer instance for receiving call service state updates in a specified slot. The callback will be processed using the input EventRunner.
        Parameters:
        slot - Indicates the ID of the slot. The value 0 indicates slot 1, and the value 1 indicates slot 2.
        runner - Indicates the EventRunner to process the callback.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - Throws this exception if there is no EventRunner that can process the callback.

    • Method Detail

      • onVoiceMailMsgIndicatorUpdated

        public void onVoiceMailMsgIndicatorUpdated​(boolean isExist)
        Receives a voice mailbox state change. This callback is invoked when the voice mailbox state of a specified card updates and the observer is added to monitor the updates.
        Parameters:
        isExist - Specifies whether a voice mailbox message exists. The value true indicates that a voice mailbox message exists, and the value false indicates that no voice mailbox message exists.

      • onCfuIndicatorUpdated

        public void onCfuIndicatorUpdated​(boolean enable)
        Receives a CFU setting update. This callback is invoked when the CFU setting of a specified card updates and the observer is added to monitor the updates.
        Parameters:
        enable - Specifies whether the CFU function is enabled. The value true indicates that the CFU function is enabled, and the value false indicates that the CFU function is disabled.

      • onCallStateUpdated

        public void onCallStateUpdated​(int state,
                               String number)
        Receives a call state change. This callback is invoked when the call state of a specified card updates and the observer is added to monitor the updates.
        Parameters:
        state - Indicates the call state. The following call states are possible:
        • CallStateObserver#CALL_STATE_IDLE
        • CallStateObserver#CALL_STATE_RINGING
        • CallStateObserver#CALL_STATE_OFFHOOK
        number - Indicates the called number. The value is an empty string if the application does not have the ohos.permission#READ_CALL_LOG READ_CALL_LOG permission.
